remarks: Value of an operation given by a maps-to rule, where the first argument is a pair and the base set of the second argument is the first component of the first argument, deduction version.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Oct-2017.)
statement:
mpt2xopoveq.f $e |- F = ( x e. _V , y e. ( 1st ` x ) |-> { n e. ( 1st ` x ) | ph } ) $.
mpt2xopoveqd.1 $e |- ( ps -> ( V e. X /\ W e. Y ) ) $.
mpt2xopoveqd.2 $e |- ( ( ps /\ -. K e. V ) -> { n e. V | [. <. V , W >. / x ]. [. K / y ]. ph } = (/) ) $.
mpt2xopoveqd $p |- ( ps -> ( <. V , W >. F K ) = { n e. V | [. <. V , W >. / x ]. [. K / y ]. ph } ) $.
$d F x $.
$d K n x y $.
$d V n x y $.
$d W n x y $.
$d X n x y $.
$d Y n x y $.
$d x y $.
